lines.text: Oh look... here's a recipe for "Mary Magdalene Tarts." Betcha they're easy

Back at the convent, we have this huge clock with the 12 apostles painted on it. And I know that when the big hand is on the John and the little hand is on the Peter, it's time for the sisters to get down on their knees...
Several weeks ago, our chef, Sister Julia,
Child of God, made some vichy-soy-ze soup and every one of the sisters died instantly of botulism.
It was kinda like "The Last Supper"
Oh look Reverend Mother. Here's a recipe for "Boy Scout Treats."
Why don't you read that one Sister?
Oh. "Boy Scout Treats. First, get 10 brownies really hot..."
